reasoning: Myositis is an umbrella term covering multiple inflammatory muscle conditions: viral myositis, autoimmune myositis (polymyositis, dermatomyositis), infectious myositis, toxic myositis. Aggregate BOTEC estimate from major subcategories with significant heterogeneity and overlap.
source: Dalakas MC. (2006). Inflammatory Muscle Diseases. N Engl J Med. 355:1772-1788
